attributes.action: Conscript John McTiernan into the infantry and put him at the front of any deployment to Iraq.
attributes.additional_details:
He is, obviously, still living in the Tony Blair era and is completely out of touch with the feeling of
 the electorate.  He has NEVER been called to account nor has he been held responsible for the disastrous actions of the government for which he was a primary political adviser.  Let him now step up to the plate, grab a rifle and lead any deployment which happens as a result of his recent most ludicrous and inept spoutings, safe in Scotland, to send more Brits to their death for nothing.
